{if FK_USER && (ID_USER!=FK_USER)} {else} {if FK_USER} {else} {endif} {endif} {if CLUB_MODERATOR && (FK_USER!=CLUB_FK_USER)} {if IS_MEMBER && CLUB_ADMIN} {if IS_MODERATOR} {else} {endif} {endif} {if IS_MEMBER} {if CLUB_ADMIN || !IS_MODERATOR} {endif} {else} {endif} {endif} {if CLUB_FK_USER==FK_USER} {else} {if IS_MODERATOR} {endif} {endif} {if !FK_USER} Not registered {else} {htm(USERNAME)} {endif} {if !FK_USER} {htm(NAME)} {else} {htm(USR_VORNAME)} {htm(USR_NACHNAME)} {endif} {if IS_MEMBER} {todate(STAMP_JOIN)} {else} Invited at {todate(STAMP_JOIN)} {endif} {todate(USR_LASTACTIV)}
